benefit.title: Travel Insurance
benefit.content: Enjoy UK & European travel insurance for up to 22 days including winter sports.

benefit.title: Mobile Phone Insurance
benefit.content: Protection against loss, theft, damage or breakdown of your mobile phone.

benefit.title: Cinema Discount
benefit.content: Great cinema prices with your Silver account. Up to 40% off at over 250 cinemas nationwide. Any day, any time.

benefit.title: tastecard Membership
benefit.content: Discounted dining at thousands of UK restaurants.

benefit.title: Preferential Travel Money Rates
benefit.content: Preferential rates on currency delivered to your home at no extra charge.

benefitBlocks.heading: Manage your sign in details
benefitBlocks.blockText: This is where you can change your personal details or password.

benefitBlocks.heading: View your past interactions with your benefits
